name: Brock
smallSnopsies: Brock is a character whose first appearance was in the very first episode of the Pokémon anime. He is the Gym Leader of Pewter City and specializes in Rock-type Pokémon.
bigSnopsies: Brock is a character whose first appearance was in the very first episode of the Pokémon anime. He is the Gym Leader of Pewter City and specializes in Rock-type Pokémon. He is also the Pewter City Gym Leader and a former traveling companion of Ash Ketchum. He specializes in Rock-type Pokémon.
